title: Stream: Burial – Rival Dealer EP
content:
Almost a year to the day since his last material, elusive Londoner Burial has released a new three track EP via Hyperdub.

Titled Rival Dealer, and featuring a title track, Hilders and Come Down To Us, it’s twenty eight minutes of unadulterated bliss. Stream each track from the EP below, and purchase it here.

Rival Dealer

Hilders

Come Down To Us
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
